AAD.caption: A List of Any Type
AAD.doc: The Bubble programmer can input nearly any list type expression here, opening up a massive can of whoop-ass on how we must process this input.
AAD.name: input_list

AAE.caption: Info
AAE.doc: This is a demo plug-in that shows the use the "anything list" input for Bubble plugins. While -- on the face of it -- this seems like a really cool interface (the user can supply ANYTHING!) -- the reality is that it's almost never worth the trouble, except in very well defined use cases.
AAE.name: info

AAG.caption: Plugin Status
AAG.doc: A string describing what's the plugin's status.
AAG.name: plugin_status

AAH.caption: List Item Description
AAH.doc: A sting describing the items in the input-list.
AAH.name: list_item_description

AAI.caption: Input Is List?
AAI.doc: Goes true if the input value is a list.
AAI.name: input_is_list

AAJ.caption: Items as Text
AAJ.doc: If we find a primitive or a Thing, we'll publish either a text version of the value, or (in the case of Things) the UID of the Thing here.
AAJ.name: items_as_text

AAK.caption: Fields on Thing
AAK.doc: If our List contains Things, we'll publish the field names of the Thing here.
AAK.name: fields_on_thing

AAL.caption: List Length
AAL.doc: If we have a list, this output will contain the number of items in the List (its "count" or "length").
AAL.name: list_length
